name: Mighty Content Locker
author: MightyContentLocker.com

sections.description:
This plugin will allow you to easily integrate your Content & File Locker produced by Mighty Content Locker into Your WordPress site.

No need to edit theme files or anything! Simply provide the Content Locker URL and Your website is now Content Locked!

Mighty Content Locker is unique and innovative Content Locking Software
that lets You operate unlimited number of Content Lockers on any of Your websites.

Mighty Content Locker is Your ‘All In One’ Content Locking Software That Turns All Your Websites into 100% Automated Revenue EXPLODER Cash Machines!!!

Mighty Content Locker is a pretty powerful Content Locking Script in the arsenal
of every Online Marketer and CPA Marketer. It is being used by hundreds of Webmasters ranging from new and advanced alike!

See The Plugin In Action by Watching This Video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=haWqwVIa1Z0

See Mighty Content Locker In Action by Watching This Video
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Esybdr-lzP4
sections.installation:
1. Upload the mighty-content-locker folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Go to the Content Locker settings page in the admin menu, and enter Your Content Locker URL produced by Mighty Content Locker

Watch This Video for Step-By-Step Usage Tutorial
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=haWqwVIa1Z0
sections.faq:
Is Mighty Content Locker WordPress Plugin free?

Yes, absolutely!

What is Mighty Content Locker?

Mighty Content Locker is Your ‘All In One’ Content Locking Software That Turns All Your Websites into 100% Automated Revenue EXPLODER Cash Machines!!!

It is a pretty powerful Content Locking Script in the arsenal
of every Online Marketer and CPA Marketer. It is being used by hundreds of Webmasters ranging from new and advanced alike!

See a detailed walkthrough of the software in the following video

From Where Can I get Mighty Content Locker?

You can obtain a copy of Mighty Content Locker Software from our Official Website at MightyContentLocker.com

In What language is written Mighty Content Locker?

Myghty Content Locker is a Content Locking Script written in PHP language

Is this plugin Supported?

Yes, absolutely!

Is Mighty Content Locker Software Supported?

Yes, absolutely!

Who is the Author & Developer of Mighty Content Locker?

Author & Developer for both the WordPress plugin and the software itself is Inno Coders
